enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for sophomore, juniors, and seniors only.
title: DOHA INTERDIS 242-0-71 Topics in Science and Technology Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Electricity dominates our lives. But our electrified world presents opportunities as well as challenges. Electric-powered technologies help complete many of our tasks and many claim electricity to be underlying energy of our civilization. At the same time, electricity exposes inequalities in the world (not all societies have access to it) and serious environmental implications. Drawing from a variety of sources and disciplines, this course examines the nuts and bolts of electricity, the history of electricity and electrification, and the consequences (good and bad) of our electrified world.

subject: INTERDIS
